entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow at times mixed with rain ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 late this morning. Temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 13 this afternoon. Forecast issued 08:15 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
